title: AZPM News - Covering Tucson and Southern Arizona
description: AZPM News provides local, in-depth and unbiased news coverage of Southern Arizona, Arizona, and the nation.
cleaned_text: How water gets to (most of) us Most of us get our water from a utility company, be it a large municipal one or a small private entity. This week, we look at the work that one small company does to keep the water flowing, and what happened when another utility had a big problem.
